recipe.title: Parmesan Roasted Cauliflower Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: ½ cup ; grated parmesan cheese ; (55 g)

steps.step: In a bowl or ziploc bag, add the cauliflower florets and olive oil and stir until fully combined.
Add the garlic powder, salt, breadcrumbs, and Parmesan. Stir until fully coated.
Spread the cauliflower on a greased, foil-lined baking sheet.
Bake for 20 minutes. Stir the cauliflower and bake for an additional 10.
